settings.title: Settings
catalog.title: Effect Catalog
record.title: Record
about.desc:
Creative audio destruction toolkit.
21 glitch effects, presets, timeline, multi-format support.
Mangle, transform and experiment with your audio.
error.no_audio: No audio loaded. Open a file first.
error.empty_timeline: Nothing to save — timeline is empty.
waveform.empty: Drop an audio file here or File > Open
preset.need_selection: Select a region first to apply a preset.
preset.create.title: Create Preset
preset.manage.title: Manage Presets
preset.tag_manage.title: Manage Tags
cat.bitcrusher.name: Bitcrusher
cat.bitcrusher.short: Reduces bit depth for lo-fi crunch
cat.bitcrusher.detail: Strips away audio resolution by reducing bit depth (24→8→4 bits). Lower values = more crunchy and digital. Great for retro gaming vibes and aggressive textures.
cat.buffer_freeze.name: Buffer Freeze
cat.buffer_freeze.short: Freezes a tiny audio moment and repeats it
cat.buffer_freeze.detail: Captures a small chunk of audio and loops it endlessly. The chunk size and fade control the texture. Creates stuttering drone effects.
cat.chorus.name: Chorus
cat.chorus.detail: Doubles the signal with slight pitch and time variations. More voices = thicker. Rate controls the wobble speed. Classic for making things sound wide and lush.
cat.datamosh.name: Datamosh
cat.datamosh.short: Corrupts audio like a broken file
cat.datamosh.detail: Swaps random chunks of audio data, like a corrupted MP3. Block size controls the glitch granularity. Higher chaos = more broken and unpredictable.
cat.delay.name: Delay
cat.delay.detail: Creates copies of the sound at timed intervals. Time sets the gap between echoes, feedback controls how many times it repeats. Essential for spacey vibes.
cat.distortion.name: Distortion
cat.distortion.detail: Pushes the audio through different clipping algorithms. Tube mode is warm, Fuzz is aggressive, Digital is harsh, Scream is extreme. Drive controls intensity.
cat.filter.name: Filter
cat.filter.detail: Removes frequencies above (lowpass) or below (highpass) a cutoff point. Resonance adds a peak at the cutoff for that classic synth sweep sound.
cat.granular.name: Granular
cat.granular.short: Chops audio into tiny grains and rearranges them
cat.granular.detail: Slices audio into micro-fragments (10-200ms) and shuffles them. Chaos controls rearrangement, density controls overlap. Creates textures from glitchy to ambient.
cat.ott.name: OTT
cat.ott.detail: Over-The-Top compression that squashes dynamics in 3 bands (low/mid/high) independently. Depth controls intensity. Makes everything louder and punchier.
cat.phaser.name: Phaser
cat.phaser.short: Sweeping notch filter for a whoosh effect
cat.phaser.detail: Moves a series of notch filters through the audio, creating that classic jet-engine whooshing sound. Rate controls speed, stages control depth of the sweep.
cat.pitch_shift.name: Pitch Shift
cat.pitch_shift.detail: Transposes audio up or down in semitones. +12 = one octave up, -12 = one octave down. Simple mode is faster but lower quality. Nightcore or chipmunk effect territory.
cat.reverse.name: Reverse
cat.reverse.detail: Flips the selected audio so it plays in reverse. Simple but powerful — reversed reverb tails, vocals, and crashes are iconic in music production.
cat.ring_mod.name: Ring Mod
cat.ring_mod.short: Multiplies signal with a sine wave for metallic tones
cat.ring_mod.detail: Ring modulation multiplies your audio by a pure tone. Creates robotic, metallic, bell-like sounds. Frequency controls the character — low = tremolo, high = alien.
cat.saturation.name: Saturation
cat.saturation.short: Adds harmonic warmth or aggressive clipping
cat.saturation.detail: Three flavors of saturation: Hard Clip chops peaks brutally, Soft Clip rounds them gently, Overdrive adds tube-like warmth. Drive controls how much.
cat.shuffle.name: Shuffle
cat.shuffle.short: Cuts audio into slices and rearranges them
cat.shuffle.detail: Splits audio into equal pieces (2-64 slices) and shuffles the order randomly. Great for instant beat-rearrangement and controlled chaos.
cat.stutter.name: Stutter
cat.stutter.detail: Takes a small piece of audio and repeats it multiple times rapidly. Repeats controls count, size controls the chunk length. The classic glitch/EDM stutter effect.
cat.tape_stop.name: Tape Stop
cat.tape_stop.short: Simulates a tape deck slowing to a halt
cat.tape_stop.detail: Gradually slows down the audio like pressing stop on a cassette player. Duration controls how long the slowdown takes. Iconic DJ effect.
cat.time_stretch.name: Time Stretch
cat.time_stretch.short: Speeds up or slows down without pitch change
cat.time_stretch.detail: Changes the duration of audio while keeping the original pitch. Factor > 1 = slower, < 1 = faster. Uses phase vocoder for quality stretching.
cat.tremolo.name: Tremolo
cat.tremolo.detail: Modulates the volume up and down at a set rate. Different shapes (sine, square, triangle, saw) create different rhythmic patterns. Classic guitar amp effect.
cat.vinyl.name: Vinyl
cat.vinyl.short: Adds crackle, hiss and warmth like old records
cat.vinyl.detail: Simulates the imperfections of vinyl playback — pops, crackles, surface noise, and subtle filtering. Amount controls how worn the record sounds.
cat.volume.name: Volume
cat.volume.short: Adjusts loudness from silent to extreme boost
cat.volume.detail: Simple gain control from 0% (silence) to 10000% (massive boost with clipping). Use it to normalize quiet sections or deliberately overdrive for distortion.
catalog.subtitle: Hover over an effect in the sidebar for a quick description, or browse the full catalog here.
